00018 class ShortTimeCorrInputRef
00019         : public ConfigBase
00020         , public ManageableInput
00021 {
00022     friend std::ofstream & operator<<(std::ofstream & os, const ShortTimeCorrInputRef & cir);
00023 public:
00025 
00028     typedef CorrInputMech<ShortTimeCorrInputRef> related_component;
00029 
00031     MAKE_VISITABLE(ShortTimeCorrInputRef)
00032 
00033 public:
00034 //  ShortTimeCorrInputRef(double base_rate, double correlation);
00035     ShortTimeCorrInputRef(std::ifstream & is);
00036     ~ShortTimeCorrInputRef();
00037     inline const double & rate_when_not_correlated() const {
00038         return rate_when_not_correlated_;
00039     }
00040     inline const double & rate_when_correlated() const {
00041         return rate_when_correlated_;
00042     }
00043     const bool & correlated_event_state() const;
00044 private:
00045     void input_update();
00046     double base_rate_;
00047     double correlation_;
00048     double rate_when_not_correlated_, rate_when_correlated_;
00049     bool * correlated_event_state_list_;
00050     Size index_, flying_index_;
00051     Size time_spread_in_time_step_;
00052 };

00057 // inline definitions
00059 
00060 
00062 // updates the correlation state of a correlated group neuron
00063 inline void ShortTimeCorrInputRef::input_update()
00064 {
00065     correlated_event_state_list_[index_] = false;
00066     // move the index forward (and go back beginning of cycle if needed)
00067     ++index_;
00068     if (index_ == time_spread_in_time_step_) index_ = 0;
00069     // update the array of event with test
00070     if (RandomGenerator::probability_trial_for_time_step(base_rate_)) {// same rate as base rate
00071         flying_index_ = index_;
00072         for (Size i = 0; i < time_spread_in_time_step_; ++i) {
00073             ++flying_index_;
00074             if (flying_index_ == time_spread_in_time_step_) flying_index_ = 0;
00075             correlated_event_state_list_[flying_index_] = true;
00076         }
00077     }
00078 }
00079 
00081 // updates the correlation state of a correlated group neuron
00082 inline const bool & ShortTimeCorrInputRef::correlated_event_state() const
00083 {
00084     return correlated_event_state_list_[index_];
00085 }
